items.summary: Update the backend new-user creation lifecycle so that, when a Principal is seen for the first time (i.e., the user record does not yet exist), the canister automatically creates two empty, normal custom lists owned by that user named exactly “Week” and “Month” (non-quadrant: quadrant=false, urgent=false, important=false). This must run for all authenticated users (not admin-only) and must be part of the one-time user creation path (not invoked on subsequent app loads).

Ensure the backend never auto-recreates “Week” and/or “Month” for an existing user after initial creation. Specifically: if the user later deletes or renames either list, subsequent logins, quadrant bootstrap calls, or list fetches must not recreate them automatically.
